      • parseIdBuffer

        public int parseIdBuffer(NurApi api,
                         byte[] data,
                         int offset,
                         int dataLen,
                         boolean includeMeta,
                         boolean isIrData)
        Tag ID buffer parser. NOTE: do not use. Only for API's internal use!
        Parameters:
        api - The NurApi instance to be used with various operation such as read and write.
        data - Source byte data.
        offset - Offset where the buffer is currently running at.
        dataLen - Length of the given data.
        includeMeta - If true then the tag metadata is included.
        isIrData - If true, then the response also contains tag's inventory + read data.
        Returns:
        The buffer position after parsing.

      • xpcRemovalEnabled

        public boolean xpcRemovalEnabled()
        Returns:
        Returns whether the XPC removal is currently enabled / not.

      • enableXPCRemoval

        public void enableXPCRemoval(boolean enable)
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable automatic XPC removing, false to prevent it.
